$g$ = ← prime number, $p$ = ← prime number
($g$, $p$ are not secret)
Patrick
$a$ = ← integer

$A$ $= g^a \mod{p}=$

$K =$ $B^a$ $\mod{p} =$
Spongebob
$b$ = ← integer

$K =$ $A^b$ $\mod{p} =$

$B$ $= g^b \mod{p} =$
$K$ is the secret key

(in practice, very large numbers are used. then it is almost impossible to calculate $K$ given $g, p, A$ and $B$))
